#10 0x08058da7 in main ()

comments.author: mconnor@mozilla.com
comments.text:
This looks like gentoo stuff.

If you build directly from mozilla.org CVS, what happens?
comments.raw_text:
This looks like gentoo stuff.

If you build directly from mozilla.org CVS, what happens?

comments.author: dm@chello.nl
comments.raw_text:
I've upgraded to firefox-1.0_pre and it seems to be fixed! 
Thanks
